titles.title: To prohibit the further extension or establishment of national monuments in Montana except by express authorization of Congress.
To prohibit the further extension or establishment of national monuments in Montana except by express authorization of Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary: Prohibits any further extension or establishment of national parks and monuments in Montana except by express authorization of Congress.
